lyrics:
10 contributorsreminded lyricsverse 1
down too long like i was before
and ive never thought id see the day
cant be wrong cause i know the score
and i guess there is no other way

chorus
reminded of you
reminded of you
reminded of you
reminded of you
reminded

verse 2
there it is all in black and white
and it looks like thats the way it goes
doesnt matter if its wrong or right
cause by now im sure that i know

chorus
reminded of you
reminded of you
reminded of you
reminded of you
reminded
see drowning pool liveget tickets as low as 99you might also likepostchorus
never felt so undecided
everything ive ever had
has been taken away
little boy so scared and frightened
all of the things that have happened
im surely to blame blame

verse 3
accept your fate then youll be well
but the truth is that it never ends
you can say that youve been through hell
but youll always lose another friend

chorus
reminded of you
reminded of you
reminded of you
reminded of you
reminded

postchorus
never felt so unimportant
everything ive ever said
has been taken in vain
little girl so scared and frightened
all of the things that i do
are still subject to change
chorus
reminded of you
